00020 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_THRIFT_CLIENT_H
00021 #define HYPERTABLE_THRIFT_CLIENT_H

00023 // Note: do NOT add any hypertable dependencies in this file
00024 #include <protocol/TBinaryProtocol.h>
00025 #include <transport/TSocket.h>
00026 #include <transport/TTransportUtils.h>
00027 
00028 #include "gen-cpp/HqlService.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Hypertable { namespace Thrift {
00031 
00032 using namespace facebook::thrift;
00033 using namespace facebook::thrift::protocol;
00034 using namespace facebook::thrift::transport;
00035 
00036 // helper to initialize base class of Client
00037 struct ClientHelper {
00038   boost::shared_ptr<TTransport> socket;
00039   boost::shared_ptr<TTransport> transport;
00040   boost::shared_ptr<TProtocol> protocol;
00041 
00042   ClientHelper(const std::string &host, int port)
00043     : socket(new TSocket(host, port)),
00044       transport(new TFramedTransport(socket)),
00045       protocol(new TBinaryProtocol(transport)) { }
00046 };
00047 
00051 class Client : private ClientHelper, public ThriftGen::HqlServiceClient {
00052 public:
00053   Client(const std::string &host, int port, int timeout_ms = 30000,
00054          bool open = true)
00055     : ClientHelper(host, port), HqlServiceClient(protocol) {
00056     if (open)
00057       connect(timeout_ms);
00058   }
00059 
00060   void connect(int timeout_ms) {
00061     // nop until thrift transport has a timeout, which it should
00062     transport->open();
00063   }
00064 
00065   // convenience method for common case
00066   void hql_query(ThriftGen::HqlResult &ret, const std::string &cmd) {
00067     hql_exec(ret, cmd, 0, 0);
00068   }
00069 };
00070 
00071 }} // namespace Hypertable::Thrift
00072 
00073 #endif /* HYPERTABLE_THRIFT_CLIENT_H */
